description: Numeric identifier of the enumerated link status used to classify an association between fleet assets (such as device-to-vehicle or tractor-to-trailer). Specific association type is organization-specific; confirm with SME.

Business label describing the state of an association between fleet assets (such as device-to-vehicle or tractor-to-trailer), indicating whether the link is ongoing, temporary, or ended. Exact semantics may vary; confirm with SME.
